LanguageData.BuildBalista_Crate.label: Build balista crate
LanguageData.BuildBalista_Crate.description: Use this to build a neolithic balista.
LanguageData.BuildCatapult_Crate.label: Build catapult crate
LanguageData.BuildCatapult_Crate.description: Use this to build a catapult that launches explosive/incendiary shells. Must be manned.
LanguageData.BuildM240B_Crate.label: Build 7.62x51mm M240B MG crate
LanguageData.BuildM240B_Crate.description: Use this to build a 7.62x51mm M240B MG, a type of stationary manned turret.
LanguageData.BuildMinigunTurret_Crate.label: Build 7.62x51mm M134 Minigun crate
LanguageData.BuildMinigunTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 7.62x51mm M134 Minigun, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 7.62x51mm ammo.
LanguageData.BuildMGTurret_Crate.label: Build 50BMG M2 Browning MG crate
LanguageData.BuildMGTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 50BMG M2 Browning MG, a type of stationary manned turret.
LanguageData.BuildKPV_Crate.label: Build 14.5mm KPV MG crate
LanguageData.BuildKPV_Crate.description: Use this to build a 14.5mm KPV MG, a type of stationary manned turret. Requires 14.5mm bullets for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildOerlikonautocannon_Crate.label: Build 20x102mm Oerlikon autocannon crate
LanguageData.BuildOerlikonautocannon_Crate.descriptio: Use this to build an Oerlikon autocannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 20x102mm for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildVulcanCannon_Crate.label: Build 20mm Vulcan Cannon crate
LanguageData.BuildVulcanCannon_Crate.description: Use this to build a 20mm Vulcan Cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. Requires 800 W to function and it uses 20mmx20 Vulcan Bullets for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildChain_Crate.label: Build 30x165mm GSh-30 cannon crate
LanguageData.BuildChain_Crate.description: Use this to build a 30x165mm GSh-30 cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30x165mm for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildAvenger_Crate.label: Build 30x165mm GAU-8 Avenger crate
LanguageData.BuildAvenger_Crate.description: Use this to build a 30x165mm GAU-8 Avenger, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30x165mm shells for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildAGSturret_Crate.label: Build 30mm AGS-17 crate
LanguageData.BuildAGSturret_Crate.description: Use this to build a AGS-17, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30mmx6 GL Turret Grenades for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildAGCturret_Crate.label: Build 30mm AGS-30 crate
LanguageData.BuildAGCturret_Crate.description: Use this to build AGS-30, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30mmx6 GL Turret Grenades for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildMortar_Crate.label: Build 81mm Mortar Launcher crate
LanguageData.BuildMortar_Crate.description: Use this to build a mortar launcher, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 81mm Explosive Mortar Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildFlakTurret_Crate.label: Build 90mm Flak turret crate
LanguageData.BuildFlakTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 90mm Flak turret a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 90mm Cannon Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildCannonTurret_Crate.label: Build 120mm Tank cannon crate
LanguageData.BuildCannonTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 120mm Tank Cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 120mm Cannon Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildHowitzerTurret_Crate.label: Build 155mm Howitzer Cannon Crate
LanguageData.BuildHowitzerTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 155m Howitzer Cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 155mm Howitzer Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildTOW_Crate.label: Build AT missile BGM-71 TOW crate
LanguageData.BuildTOW_Crate.description: Use this to build a Light Missile System BGM-71 TOW, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses AT missiles for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildTOW_Crate.jobString: Building AT missile BGM-71 TOW crate.
LanguageData.BuildLightMissileSystem_Crate.label: Build AT missile FGM-148 Javelin crate
LanguageData.BuildLightMissileSystem_Crate.descriptio: Use this to build a Light Missile System FGM-148 Javelin, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses AT missile for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildLightMissileSystem_Crate.jobString: Building AT missile FGM-148 Javelin crate.
LanguageData.BuildMediumMissileSystem_Crate.label: Build 130mm Medium Missile System crate
LanguageData.BuildMediumMissileSystem_Crate.descripti: Use this to build a Medium Missile System, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 130mmx2 Missiles for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildRocketLauncher_Crate.label: Build 130mm Heavy Missile System crate
LanguageData.BuildRocketLauncher_Crate.description: Use this to build a Heavy Missile System, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 130mmx3 missiles for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildSentryTurret_Crate.label: Build .40 Rimfire Sentry light crate
LanguageData.BuildSentryTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build an automated sentry light turret, a type of stationary automatic turret. It requires power to function.
LanguageData.BuildHeavyTurret_Crate.label: Build 145x114mm Sentry heavy crate
LanguageData.BuildHeavyTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a laser turret, a type of unmanned automatic turret. It requires power to function.
LanguageData.BuildNavalGunTurret_Crate.label: Build 30x165mm Sentry naval crate
LanguageData.BuildNavalGunTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build Sentry naval turret, a type of stationary unmanned turret.
LanguageData.BuildSentryRocketLauncher_Crate.label: Build AT missile Sentry rocket launcher crate
LanguageData.BuildSentryRocketLauncher_Crate.descript: Use this to build an Sentry rocket launcher, a type of stationary unmanned turret.
LanguageData.BuildSentryRocketLauncher_Crate.jobStrin: Building AT missile Sentry rocket launcher crate.
LanguageData.BuildSentryBlasterTurret_Crate.label: Build 6x24mm Sentry blaster crate
LanguageData.BuildSentryBlasterTurret_Crate.descripti: Use this to build a sentry blaster turret crate, a type of automatic turrets. Requires power to function.
LanguageData.BuildLaserTurret_Crate.label: Build Laser Turret crate
LanguageData.BuildLaserTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a Laser Turret, a type of unmanned automatic turret. It requires power to function.
